original_text: And in the days of Saul they waged war against the Hagrites, who fell into their hand. And they lived in their tents throughout all the region east of Gilead.
korean_text: 사울 왕 때에 그들이 하갈 사람과 더불어 싸워 손으로 쳐죽이고 길르앗 동쪽 온 땅에서 장막에 거주하였더라

sentences.original_text: And in the days of Saul
they waged war against the Hagrites
And they lived in their tents
throughout all the region east of Gilead
